content: LOT 1: 2016 Cryptocracy 3-Coin Set #10LOT 2: 2013 CryptoVest "Special First Edition" #471*Comes with COAs*LOT 3: 2014 SerpCoin DIY2 + 2013 Casascius aluminumLOT 4: 2014 SerpCoin DIY2 + 2013 Casascius aluminumSTARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0005BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: DECEMBER 16th, 2023, 14:00:00 PST**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT:BTC: bc1qxsynpetjqzcftk828k6u77khy3nf528nqs8qtsSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED
